items.name: Digital Earth Australia CoastLines
items.chartDisclaimer: The graph below shows the distance (in metres) from each 1988-2017 coastline relative to the 2018 baseline. Negative distances below indicate coastlines that were located inland of the 2018 coastline, while positive values indicate coastlines located towards the ocean.

items.name: Annual coastlines

Annual coastlines represent the typical (i.e. median) position of the shoreline at approximately Mean Sea Level (~0 m AHD) across the entire year period.
